about_the_game:
Important:

• If you already have the Chi-Nu Kai, you will receive 2,100 gold in compensation
• If you already have the Shinobi Legendary camouflage, you will receive 450 gold in compensation.

This bundle includes:

• Chi-Nu Kai Premium tank (Japan, medium, Tier V)
• Garage slot
• 9 equipment slots
• Shinobi Legendary camouflage
• 10 Rare Combat XP boosters
• 10 Rare Free XP boosters

The Chi-Nu Kai is a vehicle of exceptional talent and one of the rarest tanks in the game. It offers a good amount of HP, noteworthy single-shot damage, and, most importantly, amazing earning power!

This DLC bundle can only be added to your World of Tanks Blitz account once.
